sn45.19:1.2: “Reverend, they speak of this thing called the ‘spiritual path’.
sn45.19:1.3: What is the spiritual path? And what is the culmination of the spiritual path?”
sn45.19:1.5: Your approach and articulation are excellent, and it’s a good question.
sn45.19:1.7: ‘They speak of this thing called “the spiritual path”.
sn45.19:1.8: What is the spiritual path? And what is the culmination of the spiritual path?’”
sn45.19:1.10: “The spiritual path is simply this noble eightfold path, that is:
sn45.19:1.11: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.19:1.12: The ending of greed, hate, and delusion:
sn45.19:1.13: this is the culmination of the spiritual path.”
